question:
Consider the following statements about the Skills Strengthening for Industrial Value Enhancement (STRIVE) project:
  1. It aims to increase the efficiency of vocational training provided through Industrial Training Institutes (ITI) and apprenticeship programs in the country
  2. The project is World Bank funded technical assistance project
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Skills Training for Industrial Value Enhancement (STRIVE) First statement is correct. This project aims at improving the relevance and efficiency of vocational training provided in the country through Industrial Training Institutes (ITI) and apprenticeship programs. Second statement is incorrect. The project has received funding from World Bank, in the form of loan assistance and not technical assistance. Recently, the Indian Government has entered into a \"financing agreement\" with World Bank for $125 million to fund a skill development programme. This would help to improve the performance of Industrial Training Institutes and increase the capacities of state governments to support industrial training institutes and apprenticeship training programmes.
